instruction: Which film became the highest-grossing Indian movie of 2025?
context: The year 2025 saw a massive surge in box office collections. The spy-action thriller 'Dhurandhar', starring Ranveer Singh, led the charts with a worldwide gross of ₹1,328.23 crore. It was followed by Rishab Shetty's 'Kantara: Chapter 1', which earned between ₹850–900 crore, making it the biggest Diwali release of the year.
response: 'Dhurandhar', a spy-action thriller starring Ranveer Singh, was the highest-grossing Indian film of 2025, earning ₹1,328.23 crore worldwide.

instruction: Who won the 3rd ODI between India and New Zealand on January 18, 2026?
context: The New Zealand tour of India 2026 began with a three-match ODI series. In the final match held at Holkar Cricket Stadium in Indore on January 18, 2026, New Zealand scored 337/8 in 50 overs. India was bowled out for 296 in 46 overs. New Zealand won the match by 41 runs, though India had already shown strong form earlier in the month.
response: New Zealand won the 3rd ODI by 41 runs after scoring 337/8 and bowling India out for 296.

instruction: What is the Indian government's deadline for making the country Naxal-free?
context: Union Home Minister Amit Shah has repeatedly emphasized the government's commitment to internal security. During a review in 2025, he reiterated that under the leadership of PM Narendra Modi, the Ministry of Home Affairs has set a firm target to completely eradicate Naxalism from India by March 31, 2026.
response: The Indian government has set a deadline of March 31, 2026, to make the country free from Naxalism.

instruction: What historic milestone did 'Border 2' achieve before its release in January 2026?
context: Ahead of its worldwide theatrical release on January 23, 2026, the Sunny Deol starrer 'Border 2' created history in pre-sales. By January 22, 2026, it surpassed the final pre-sale ticket records of the 2025 hit 'Dhurandhar' on BookMyShow, selling over 224,000 tickets 24 hours before its premiere.
response: By January 22, 2026, 'Border 2' surpassed the pre-sale records of the 2025 blockbuster 'Dhurandhar', selling more than 224,000 tickets on BookMyShow before its official release.

instruction: Who were the leaders of the Indian T20 squad for the series against New Zealand in January 2026?
context: Following the exclusion of Shubman Gill from the T20 format, the BCCI announced the squad for the 5-match T20 series starting January 21, 2026. Suryakumar Yadav was retained as the captain, while all-rounder Axar Patel was appointed as the vice-captain. The series is seen as a crucial preparation for the upcoming T20 World Cup in February.
response: Suryakumar Yadav served as the captain and Axar Patel was the vice-captain for the T20 series against New Zealand in January 2026.

instruction: What major AI event is scheduled to take place in New Delhi in February 2026?
context: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has been organizing several pre-summit workshops throughout January 2026. These lead up to the 'India AI Impact Summit 2026', which is scheduled to be held in New Delhi from February 16 to February 20, 2026, focusing on inclusive growth and sustainable AI.
response: The 'India AI Impact Summit 2026' is scheduled to take place in New Delhi from February 16 to February 20, 2026.

instruction: Which former cricketer participated as a speaker at the Data Engineering Summit 2025?
context: The Data Engineering Summit (DES), organized by AIM Media House, featured several high-profile speakers in its 2025 edition. Among the industry leaders and tech VPs was Anil Kumble, the former Indian Cricket Captain and Coach, who shared insights on data and leadership.
response: Anil Kumble, the former Indian cricketer, captain, and coach, was a speaker at the Data Engineering Summit 2025.

instruction: What was the outcome of the 2025 Delhi Legislative Assembly election?
context: In the Delhi Legislative Assembly elections held on February 5, 2025, the political landscape saw a major shift. The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) secured a decisive victory, winning a two-thirds majority in the house, ousting the incumbent government.
response: The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) won a two-thirds majority in the 2025 Delhi Legislative Assembly election.

instruction: Which Indian bowler reached the No. 1 spot in T20 rankings as of January 2026?
context: As the Indian team prepared for the 2026 home season, the bowling attack was spearheaded by seasoned veterans and rising stars. Varun Chakravarthy entered the January 2026 T20 series against New Zealand as the world's No. 1 ranked T20 bowler, supported by Arshdeep Singh and Jasprit Bumrah.
response: Varun Chakravarthy was the world No. 1 T20 bowler as of January 2026.

instruction: What significant social policy did the Indian government announce in April 2025?
context: On April 30, 2025, the Government of India made a landmark political announcement following years of debate. The government officially declared that it would conduct a comprehensive Caste Census to better understand the demographic and socio-economic breakdown of the country.
response: The Government of India announced on April 30, 2025, that it would conduct a national Caste Census.
